participants.name: Carrie Giordano
participants.title: Employee Engagement Director at International Cruise and Excursions

messages.message: Well, I can get you the best pricing on cruises :) We happen to be one of the top travel agencies in the world...www.iceenterprise.com
Awesome, they have an office right by my house. Any need for a software/IT geek like me?
We do create 90 % of our software...go to the website I gave you and see if they have any openings for your expertise...

Hmm, Dishwasher or Network Security Engineer? lol
https://people.gild.com/jobs/72848870-19e7-42ef-84a5-f2c3f5e0ccbf
If I apply should I put your name on it somewhere?
Well, you do apply science to everything so...I am sure you could come up with some experimental stuff in the dishwasher area...lol
yes, you may use my name as a reference...just no hacking!!!
Haha, I've totally though about it, you should just be able to put plates in the sink and it will organize them for you. My wife comes along and reorganizes everything anyways.

I completely can relate! haha...Anyway, yes, feel free to put me as a reference. Go to Career Opportunities. If you have anyone seeking a lucrative career in sales, if you wouldn't mind, will you send the my way? I recruit for our sales departments and I am seeking top talent in the valley...Much appreciated
Sales. I'll keep an ear out.
I applied for ICE but I got denied before even speaking to a human. I thought you were interested in top talent?

Hi Brian,

I am not part of Human Resources, I work on recruiting for Top Sales people in the Valley...What position did you apply for with ICE?

If the position was filled, they would also send an e-mail to inform you they chose another candidate...It is hard to get into ICE because although we post open positions, if someone internally meets the qualifications, they will take some internally over externally...
Oh OK, just following the posts.
